```{r}
path_cohort_1 <- projr::projr_path_get(
  "raw-data-mtbvac050", "cohort 1-original analysis", "MTBVAC A050_ 20210319_CS"
)
path_wsp_056 <- file.path(path_cohort_1, "MTBVAC A050_ 20210319_CS_primary_D0_56_QC_TRCS.wsp")
wsp <- CytoML::open_flowjo_xml(path_wsp_056)
fcs_vec_056 <- list.files(
  path_cohort_1,
  pattern = "_Day56_.*\\.fcs$|_Day0_.*\\.fcs$"
)
gs <- CytoML::flowjo_to_gatingset(
  wsp,
  subset = fcs_vec_056
  )
counts <- flowWorkspace::gs_pop_get_count_fast(gs)
UtilsCytoRSV::chnl(gs)
chnl_to_marker_lab <- UtilsCytoRSV::chnl_to_marker(
  flowWorkspace::gh_pop_get_data(gs[[1]])
  )
```
